name: Memories of Lillies
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2021, Memories of Lillies is a short exploratory experience. Guide your gondola through a sunken city using these controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • E - Dismount your gondola, interact with objects
  • Space - Jump

Credits:

  • Lia Snyderman, Max Piepenbrink, Wesley Mueller

Notes:

  • Currently Windows only, will do other builds if there's popular demand.
